release.action: Fixed query to Rhea web services (retrieving reactions by UniProt accession now, instead of EC number).
Updated to latest version of parent, rhea-adapter, intenz-adapter, ebeye-adapter, ep-domain (removed duplicate dependency declaration, btw), ep-util, rhea-domain, xchars and log4j.
Replaced dependency on uk.ac.ebi.ep:ebeye-client with the shared equivalent module uk.ac.ebi.biobabel:ebeye:client.
